intro_01: The world was silent. Beyond the order that had endured for centuries, an unheard call echoed. A fine crack opened in the fabric of time — destiny shifted in silence.
intro_02: A forgotten prophecy was awakening once more. Neither the sacred nor the kings foresaw it. Only one — the Sleeping Oracle — saw the change in a dream… and feared to wake.
intro_03: The choice was made. Not by the voice of the people, nor by the command of kingdoms. The Council of Eternity, for the sake of ancient blood, granted him a name: The Last Envoy.
intro_04: The balance was broken. The earth trembled, the sky revealed its fury. No secret could remain hidden now — no lie could last forever.
intro_05: Faiths will clash, and secrets will be unveiled. And the Envoy will pursue a single truth: Who will bear the light of reality?
